text: Helena Escholin (1713-1783) was a Finnish clergyman's wife and made wafers for the Turku Cathedral.Vainio-Korhonen, Kirsi: Suomen herttuattaren arvoitus. Suomalaisia naiskohtaloita 1700 luvulta. Edita Publishing Oy, Helsinki, 2009 Her records have been researched and are considered valuable in Finnish historical research. ==References== Category:1713 births Category:1783 deaths Category:18th-century Finnish people
title: Helena Escholin
